long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EchoTab is your go-to Chrome extension for effortless tab management. Streamline your browsing with powerful features designed to keep you organized and efficient.

Features:
CmdK Command: Quickly control your tabs with a simple command.
Tab Search: Instantly find the tab you need.
Tab Tagging: Organize tabs with custom tags.
AI-Powered Tagging: Automatic smart tagging for easy organization.
Tab Stats: Keep track of your tab usage.
Tab Lists: Create and manage lists of tabs.
Open-Source: Transparent and community-driven.
Local Data Storage: Your data stays on your device, safe and private.
